file.name: cors_sample.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://petstore.swagger.io/v2
info:
  description: 'This is an example to demonstrate CORS configurations in OpenAPI Specification file.'
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore New
  termsOfService: http://swagger.io/terms/
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
tags:
  - name: pet
x-wso2-basePath: /petstore/v1
x-wso2-production-endpoints:
  urls:
    - https://petstore.swagger.io/v2
x-wso2-cors:                        # defines CORS configurations
  access-control-allow-origins:
    - test.com
    - example.com
  access-control-allow-headers:
    - Authorization
    - Content-Type
  access-control-allow-methods:
    - GET
    - PUT
    - POST
paths:
  "/pet/findByStatus":
    get:
      tags:
        - pet
      summary: Finds Pets by status
      description: Multiple status values can be provided
      operationId: findPetsByStatus
      parameters:
        - name: status
          in: query
          description: Status values that need to be considered for filter
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
              enum:
                - available
                - pending
                - sold
              default: available
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Pet"
        '400':
          description: Invalid status value
components:
  schemas:
    Pet:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - photoUrls
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        category:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        photoUrls:
          type: string
        tags:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
          enum:
            - available
            - pending
            - sold
      xml:
        name: Pet
  requestBodies:
    Pet:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Pet"
        application/xml:
          schema:
            "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Pet"
      description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store
      required: true
